channel.title: Pi help pleas
channel.description: ok what do i need to change for people to get on my pi server. its different from delta and ive been looking around for like a week now and starting to get bored and mad:/ ive tried putting in my no-ip in the client but there is like 3 spots in the client to do it and idk its confusing. so maybe its in the server idk. and i think its a exion client. its marcbob's mtp v.2 [pleas help ive spent like 3 weeks editing the server and now people cant get on lol.

item.title: Pi help pleas
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

i added you. i think i have it i just need somebody to test it for me. i can host it on my desktop and get on there and play on my laptop at the same time. but when other people try to login it says error connecting. maybe its just them idk:/

one more problem. this just started happening recently when i log out my client screen freezes and then says some error i forget but this is what it sais in my run cmd for the server.

item.title: Pi help pleas
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

try pressing ctrl f and search for 127.0.0.1 witch probly will have it set atm and then change it to your no-ip. You probly already have if people connected on your delta then you portforwarded but they couldnt then you didnt portforward. If you need more help add me on msn v_matt95@hotmail.com i can probly help on team viewer

Read full topic

item.title: Pi help pleas
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

ok what do i need to change for people to get on my pi server. its different from delta and ive been looking around for like a week now and starting to get bored and mad:/ ive tried putting in my no-ip in the client but there is like 3 spots in the client to do it and idk its confusing. so maybe its in the server idk. and i think its a exion client. its marcbob’s mtp v.2 [pleas help ive spent like 3 weeks editing the server and now people cant get on lol.
